name: 18 Wheels of Steel Collection #2
description:
Things get dangerous when you’re haulin’ a trailer full of lumber down a 6% grade. In this collection, you’ll pit your driving skill against dangerous roads and aggressive deadlines. Just be sure you throw some chains on in the snow before you go greasy side up bubba!

Games included in this bundle:
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: Haulin'
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: American Long Haul
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: Extreme Trucker
  • 18 Wheels of Steel: Extreme Trucker 2
